Title: Mosquito.ViewModel
Description: A minimal MVVM library aimed at removing the pain of implementing ViewModels.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A minimal MVVM library aimed at removing the pain of implementing ViewModels.

Mosquito.ViewModel is not yet another MVVM framework.
It is meant to compliment other frameworks and tackles areas where I fell all of them are lacking.
Like observable collections.

//TODO: add more pretext

Contents

  • ObservableTree<TKey, TValue> - implements INotifyCollectionChanged for a recursive structure
  • SortedObservableTree<TKey, TKeyPart, TValue> - like ObservableTree, except is also sorts the nodes it receives
  • SortedObservableTree<TValue> - a specialized version of SortedObservableTree, in which TKey is TkeyPart is string and the key depends on the value
